gobblin.audit.sink

Class FsAuditSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.audit.sink.FsAuditSink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuditSink, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class FsAuditSink
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuditSink
    A Hadoop FileSystem based AuditSink that writes audit GenericRecords to a file on FileSystem.
    • The FileSystem URI can be set using key ConfigurationKeys.FS_URI_KEY, ConfigurationKeys.LOCAL_FS_URI is used by default.
    • All audit files are written under the base path. The base path can be set using key FS_SINK_AUDIT_OUTPUT_PATH_KEY. The default path is, 
        System.getProperty("user.dir") + "/lumos_value_audit/local_audit";
    • It uses auditMetadata to build the audit file name and path.
      The layout on FileSystem - 
        |-- <Database>
    |-- <Table>
       |-- P=<PHASE>.C=<CLUSTER>.E=<EXTRACT_ID>.S=<SNAPSHOT_ID>.D=<DELTA_ID>
          |-- *.avro
